Package dev.blu.model.core

Class FileConfiguration

java.lang.Object
dev.blu.model.core.FileConfiguration
public class FileConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
Describes the File that is going to be processed or is being processed in a FileAction
Author:
blubo
